title: Stanley Kubrick’s ‘Don’t F*** with Me’ Letter
subtitle: The famed film director supposedly wrote a profanity-laced letter to MGM executive James Aubrey over the studio's plans for a '2001' sequel..
author: David Emery
vclaim: Director Stanley Kubrick wrote a profanity-laced letter to MGM executive James T. Aubrey warning him not to make a sequel to '2001: A Space Odyssey.'
